actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to deal with the current energy crisis and the serious shortages of petroleum products facing the Nation and to authorize construction of the trans-Alaska pipeline.

summary.text: Trans-Alaskan Pipeline Authorization Act - Authorizes construction of the trans-Alaska pipeline. Directs the Secretary of Interior to issue a right-of-way permit. Declares that any Federal administrative decision on actions under this legislation shall not be subject to judicial review.

titles.title: A bill to deal with the current energy crisis and the serious shortages of petroleum products facing the Nation and to authorize construction of the trans-Alaska pipeline.
